abstract: Powered by Microsoft’s Windows Home Server software, Hewlett-Packard’s MediaSmart Server is intended for the home.
snippet: Powered by Microsoft’s Windows Home Server software, Hewlett-Packard’s MediaSmart Server is intended for the home.
lead_paragraph: It may not be the sexiest part of computing, but storage is becoming increasingly critical as masses of photo, music and video files accumulate. Microsoft thinks it’s time families had help storing it all with computer servers intended for the home.

headline.main: Computer Servers for Home Use Can Help Get a Grip on All Those Photo, Music and Video Files in the PC Attic
headline.print_headline: Computer Servers for Home Use Can Help Get a Grip On All Those Photo, Music and Video Files in the PC Attic

abstract: Motorola’s Q Global smartphone can sync your e-mail with Microsoft Outlook on your PC, and you can transfer Office documents between a PC and the device.
snippet: Motorola’s Q Global smartphone can sync your e-mail with Microsoft Outlook on your PC, and you can transfer Office documents between a PC and the device.
lead_paragraph: Motorola’s Moto Q line of smartphones has a new entry, the Q Global, also called the Q9h. This one has been redesigned to make services easy to activate with dedicated keys, so it takes one click to get to e-mail, the calendar, music, the Internet, the camera (both still and video) and the phone.

headline.main: For All You Smartphone Users With Big Thumbs: Motorola’s New Q Global Aims to Encourage You to Type
headline.print_headline: For All You Smartphone Users With Big Thumbs: Motorola’s New Q Global Aims to Encourage You to Type
